name: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup, fresh berries, and a dusting of powdered sugar.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Toasted whole grain bread topped with smashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.

name: Breakfast Burrito
description: A hearty burrito filled with scrambled eggs, black beans, cheese, and your choice of bacon or sausage.

name: Cappuccino
description: A rich and creamy espresso drink topped with a thick layer of milk foam.

name: Latte
description: A smooth espresso-based coffee with steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

name: Iced Mocha
description: A refreshing blend of espresso, chocolate, and milk served over ice and topped with whipped cream.

name: Veggie Wrap
description: A healthy wrap filled with fresh vegetables, hummus, and feta cheese, served with a side salad.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: A creamy and tropical smoothie made with fresh mango, yogurt, and a touch of honey.

name: Blueberry Muffin
description: A soft and moist muffin loaded with fresh blueberries and a hint of lemon zest.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Classic grilled cheese made with sharp cheddar and buttered sourdough bread, served with a side of tomato soup.

name: French Toast
description: Thick slices of brioche dipped in a sweet cinnamon egg mixture and served with powdered sugar and syrup.

name: Matcha Latte
description: A soothing blend of matcha green tea and steamed milk, topped with a light foam.

name: Banana Nut Muffin
description: A soft muffin made with ripe bananas and crunchy walnuts, perfect for a morning treat.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in Caesar dressing with croutons, Parmesan, and a lemon wedge.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: Espresso layered with vanilla syrup and steamed milk, topped with a caramel drizzle.

name: Egg & Cheese Croissant
description: A buttery croissant filled with scrambled eggs and melted cheese.

name: Ham & Cheese Panini
description: A hot-pressed sandwich filled with smoked ham, melted cheese, and Dijon mustard.

name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie made with ripe strawberries, bananas, and yogurt.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: A creamy and flavorful soup made with ripe tomatoes and fresh basil.

name: Oatmeal Bowl
description: Warm oatmeal topped with fresh fruits, honey, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: Chicken Caesar Wrap
description: A fresh wrap filled with grilled chicken, crisp romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Spinach & Feta Quiche
description: A savory quiche with a flaky crust filled with spinach, feta cheese, and a creamy egg mixture.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto cooked with sautéed mushrooms, garlic, and Parmesan cheese, garnished with parsley.

name: Berry Parfait
description: Layers of yogurt, fresh berries, and crunchy granola, served in a parfait glass.

name: Chocolate Croissant
description: A flaky croissant filled with rich chocolate, baked to perfection.

name: Mango Cheesecake
description: A creamy cheesecake topped with fresh mango slices and a mango glaze.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of breaded eggplant, marinara sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese.

name: Baked Mac & Cheese
description: A comforting bowl of pasta baked in a rich cheese sauce with a crispy topping.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: A seasonal favorite made with espresso, steamed milk, and pumpkin spice flavoring.

name: Falafel Plate
description: A platter of homemade falafels served with pita bread, hummus, and a fresh salad.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A rich and creamy hot chocolate topped with marshmallows.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A decadent chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Chicken Salad Sandwich
description: A sandwich filled with diced chicken, celery, lettuce, and mayonnaise on whole grain bread.

name: Mushroom & Spinach Omelette
description: A fluffy omelette filled with sautéed mushrooms, spinach, and cheese.

name: Lemon Tart
description: A tangy lemon filling in a buttery tart shell, topped with powdered sugar.

name: Carrot Cake
description: A moist cake filled with grated carrots and topped with a cream cheese frosting.

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: A thick and creamy milkshake made with fresh strawberries, milk, and ice cream.

name: Fruit Platter
description: An assortment of seasonal fruits served with a side of honey yogurt dip.

name: Peanut Butter Smoothie
description: A creamy blend of peanut butter, banana, and yogurt.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic spaghetti pasta served with a hearty meat sauce and Parmesan cheese.

name: Veggie Pasta Salad
description: A refreshing pasta salad with a variety of seasonal vegetables, tossed in a light vinaigrette.

name: Buttermilk Waffles
description: Crispy golden waffles served with maple syrup, whipped cream, and fresh fruits.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with gooey chocolate chips.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A traditional Indian yogurt-based drink made with fresh mangoes and a touch of cardamom.

name: Paneer Tikka Sandwich
description: A sandwich stuffed with marinated paneer, grilled onions, and bell peppers, served on a soft bun.

name: Iced Green Tea
description: A refreshing and light iced green tea infused with mint and lemon.

name: Raspberry Lemonade
description: A tangy and sweet lemonade blended with fresh raspberries and served over ice.

name: Garlic Breadsticks
description: Warm and soft breadsticks brushed with garlic butter and topped with Parmesan.

name: Penne Alfredo
description: Penne pasta tossed in a creamy Alfredo sauce, topped with grilled chicken or mushrooms.

name: Scone with Jam & Cream
description: A classic English scone served warm with strawberry jam and clotted cream.
